definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Capsule valves longitudinally vittate to abaxially vittate with lateral vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 蒴果縱向裂片具油道到背面具油道具側小泡。

sentences.english: You get a gimmicked knife and a regular knife.
sentences.chinese: 此道具包括一個帶機關的刀和一個普通的刀子。

sentences.english: He was shot by a misloaded prop gun.
sentences.chinese: 他被裝入真子彈的道具手槍打死。

sentences.english: Buy some naughty board games to play when the kids are asleep.
sentences.chinese: 買一些調皮遊戲道具，在孩子熟睡之後玩。

sentences.english: Show me the props and extras.
sentences.chinese: 道具和臨時演員在哪兒？

sentences.english: Then she’d bring back a prop man or whoever to her tent.
sentences.chinese: 然後她會帶回來一個道具男或別的人去她的帳蓬。

sentences.english: During the Han Dynasty, perfect dance with fish stage props was found .
sentences.chinese: 至漢代已有較完美的持魚道具而舞的形式。

sentences.english: The Bith costume consisted of a slip-on mask and gloves.
sentences.chinese: 比思人道具服包括套頭面具和手套。

sentences.english: So he took his costume and away he went.
sentences.chinese: 於是他拿起了自己的服裝道具去了。

sentences.english: There is a more subtle change props, is to change the card punch, also known as electric claw hand.
sentences.chinese: 還有種變牌道具更隱蔽，就是變牌鬼手，也稱電爪手。

sentences.english: Which items will be customisable and will they be bound?
sentences.chinese: 哪種道具是將被流行而且被約束？

sentences.english: Most of the props used in puppet shows are handmade.
sentences.chinese: 儡戲用的木偶道具大部分都是手工製作的。

sentences.english: That equpment includes unmanned, remote-controlled, deep-water submarines.
sentences.chinese: 這道具轉換包括無人駕駛，遠程控制，深水潛艇。

sentences.english: Also shown are spare props, the flight battery, and charger.
sentences.chinese: 還示出了備用的道具的飛行電池，和充電器。

sentences.english: The props used in the dances are the tools of production used by the residents.
sentences.chinese: 道具更是將勞動中的工具直接搬上了舞臺。

sentences.english: The costumes and the candy they throw from the floats.
sentences.chinese: 服裝道具以及從遊行花車扔下來的糖果。
